posts.post_content:
Being an equipment collector, I'd like to pick up a few OJ's of catchers depicting equipment.  I'm particularly interested in those with glove(s) or with the full ensemble of glove(s), mask and chest protector.  I'm not well versed in OJ's yet, but the image of Craves of Minneapolis is similar to what I'm looking for.

Thanks!

I don't have any for sale, but you might want to try to get a Jordan one if you can. In my mind, it is one of the best looking cards in the set! His cards can get pricey though, if you can even find one. Good luck!

This one is also not for sale, but it is not tough to find.
JimB

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/jimblumenthal/n172/websize/N172%20Collins.jpg[/IMG]
I disagree Jim.  A Bill Collins card in a Hub Collins holder is very hard to find! :)
I'll take the Jordan, I guess....  Thanks.

$137 and it's yours Matt. PM me

    Scott Forrest used to collect the catcher's poses, don't think he got far before giving up. Some of them are extremely tough. I've tried to get a Cook for awhile, but the few that have showed up have gone for crazy prices

[quote name="z28jd" post=1125907]I disagree Jim.  A Bill Collins card in a Hub Collins holder is very hard to find! :)[/QUOTE]

Good point.  :)
JimB
Thanks guys, that Colins is stunning.  I'll keep a lookout...

    Scott Forrest used to collect the catcher's poses, don't think he got far before giving up. Some of them are extremely tough. I've tried to get a Cook for awhile, but the few that have showed up have gone for crazy prices[/QUOTE]
